name: Abraham Lincoln
famous_phrases: I am not bound to win, but I am bound to be true.
Determine that the thing can and shall be done and then... find the way.

name: Mahatma Gandhi
famous_phrases: The future depends on what we do in the present.
Hate the sin, love the sinner.

name: Winston Churchill
famous_phrases: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
If you're going through hell, keep going.

name: Franklin D. Roosevelt
famous_phrases: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
The country needs... bold, persistent experimentation.

name: Nelson Mandela
famous_phrases: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.

name: Martin Luther King Jr.
famous_phrases: Love is mankind's most potent weapon for personal and social transformation.

name: Mother Teresa
famous_phrases: Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love.

name: Xi Jinping
famous_phrases: The Chinese nation has stood up, grown rich, and is becoming strong.

name: Vladimir Putin
famous_phrases: Whoever does not miss the Soviet Union has no heart. Whoever wants it back has no brain.

name: Joseph Stalin
famous_phrases: The only real power comes out of a long rifle.

name: Vladimir Lenin
famous_phrases: There are decades where nothing happens; and there are weeks where decades happen.
